attrs.script:
#! /bin/bash


f_linux_8()
{
	#unregister
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "              Function Config config RHEL / OEL / RLINUX v8          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    set firewall-> disabled                          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld

}


f_linux_7()
{
	#unregister
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "             Function Config RHEL / OEL / RLINUX  v7                 "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    set firewall-> disabled                          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld

}

f_linux_common()
{

#Disable selinux
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    set Selinux -> disabled                          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
setenforce 0

#Disable AVAHI
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                        Disable AVAHI                                "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
sudo systemctl stop avahi-daemon
sudo systemctl disable avahi-daemon

#Configure Hostname
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                   Config   hostname/hostfile                        "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

echo "ORACLE 12CR2 : CONFIGURE HOSTNAME"
hostnamectl set-hostname '@@{name}@@'
echo '@@{address}@@  @@{name}@@  @@{name}@@.@@{domain_name}@@' > /etc/hosts
echo "Configuration host file : " >> /tmp/install_log.txt
echo "    hostname and host file configured" >> /tmp/install_log.txt

#Configure Hostname
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                   Config   PE SIZE TO 1024.                         "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

sed -i 's/# physical_extent_size = 4096/physical_extent_size = 1024/' /etc/lvm/lvm.conf


f_specific_oracle_params()
{
#configure oracle systcl.conf params
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           Config   SYSCTL.conf  @@{database_motor}@@                "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

echo '# sysctl settings are defined through files in
# /usr/lib/sysctl.d/, /run/sysctl.d/, and /etc/sysctl.d/.
#
# Vendors settings live in /usr/lib/sysctl.d/.
# To override a whole file, create a new file with the same in
# /etc/sysctl.d/ and put new settings there. To override
# only specific settings, add a file with a lexically later
# name in /etc/sysctl.d/ and put new settings there.
#
# For more information, see sysctl.conf(5) and sysctl.d(5).

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for fs.file-max is 6815744
fs.file-max = 6815744

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.sem is '250 32000 100 128'
kernel.sem = 250 32000 100 128

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.shmmni is 4096
kernel.shmmni = 4096

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.shmall is 1073741824 on x86_64
kernel.shmall = 1073741824

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.shmmax is 4398046511104 on x86_64
kernel.shmmax = 4398046511104

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.panic_on_oops is 1 per Orabug 19212317
kernel.panic_on_oops = 1

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.rmem_default is 262144
net.core.rmem_default = 262144

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.rmem_max is 4194304 changed to 536870912
net.core.rmem_max = 536870912

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.wmem_default is 262144 changed to 536870912
net.core.wmem_default = 536870912

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.wmem_max is 1048576
net.core.wmem_max = 1048576

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter is 2
net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter = 2

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter is 2
net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter = 2

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for fs.aio-max-nr is 1048576
fs.aio-max-nr = 1048576

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range is 9000 65500
net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range = 9000 65500

vm.swappiness = 0
vm.overcommit_memory = 1
vm.dirty_background_ratio = 5
vm.dirty_ratio = 15
vm.dirty_expire_centisecs = 500
vm.dirty_writeback_centisecs = 100
net.ipv4.tcp_mtu_probing = 1
net.ipv4.tcp_rmem = 4096 87380 536870912
net.core.netdev_max_backlog = 250000
net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control = htcp
net.core.somaxconn = 65535
net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl = 15
net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout = 15
net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes = 5
net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse = 1
net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog = 65535
net.ipv4.tcp_wmem = 4096 65536 536870912' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.conf
sudo sysctl -p

#configure limits.conf
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                      Config   LIMITS.conf                           "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

sudo sed -i '/# End of file/i \
grid soft nofile  131072\
grid hard nofile  131072\
grid soft nproc   131072\
grid hard nproc   131072\
oracle soft nofile  131072\
oracle hard nofile  131072\
oracle soft nproc   131072\
oracle hard nproc   131072\
oracle soft core  unlimited\
oracle hard core    unlimited\
oracle soft memlock 50000000\
oracle hard memlock 50000000\
oracle soft stack    10240\
oracle hard stack    32768' /etc/security/limits.conf
}

f_specific_postgres_params()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           Config   SYSCTL.conf  @@{database_motor}@@                "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo 'vm.swappiness=0
vm.overcommit_memory = 1
vm.nr_hugepages=0
vm.dirty_background_ratio = 5
vm.dirty_ratio = 15
vm.dirty_expire_centisecs = 500
vm.dirty_writeback_centisecs=100' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/97-pgsql-database-sysctl.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/97-pgsql-database-sysctl.conf

echo 'net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0
net.ipv4.conf.ens3.accept_redirects=0' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/96-disable-icmpv4.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/96-disable-icmpv4.conf

echo 'net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1
net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6 = 1' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/95-disable-ipv6.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/95-disable-ipv6.conf


echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           Config   UDEV RULES  @@{database_motor}@@                 "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo '
ACTION=="add|change", SUBSYSTEM=="block", RUN+="/bin/sh -c '/bin/echo 1024 > /sys%p/queue/max_sectors_kb'"'| sudo tee /etc/udev/rules.d/71-block-max-sectors.rules
}

}
main()
{
echo "--------------------------------------------"
echo "      It is set ..@@{app_dir_path}@@   "
echo "--------------------------------------------"
PRODUCT_MINOR_VERSION=$(egrep '^(VERSION)=' /etc/os-release | sed 's/.*=//' | sed 's/"//g')
PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION=${PRODUCT_MINOR_VERSION::1}
echo "The product version is " $PRODUCT_MINOR_VERSION
echo "The major version is " $PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION
PRODUCT_NAME=$(egrep '^(NAME)=' /etc/os-release | sed 's/.*=//' | sed 's/"//g')
echo "The linux os used is " $PRODUCT_NAME

if [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Red" ]]; then
        case $PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION in
                7)
                echo "Version is 7 we will use yum"
                f_linux_common
                f_linux_7
                ;;

                8)
                echo "Version is 8 we will use dnf"
                f_linux_common
                f_linux_8
                ;;

                *)
                echo "....I do not  ..know"
                ;;
        esac

elif [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION in
                7)
                echo "Version is 7 we will use yum"
                f_linux_common
                f_linux_7
                ;;
			
                8)
                echo "Version is 8 we will use dnf"
				f_linux_common
                f_linux_8
                ;;
                
                *)
                echo "....I do not know"
                ;;
        esac
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi

if [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
   		f_specific_oracle_param

elif [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Postgres" ]]; then
        f_specific_postgres_params
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi

}

main

exit

#!/bin/bash

f_create_def_users_profile()
{
    #Configure Users Profile
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                        Configure User Profile                         "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"


    echo 'if [ $USER = "oracle" ] || [ $USER = "grid" ] ; then
    if [ $SHELL = "/bin/ksh" ]; then             
    ulimit -p 16384             
    ulimit -n 65536             
    else             
         ulimit -u 16384 -n 65536             
    fi             
    fi' | sudo tee -a /etc/profile

    echo "@@{database_motor}@@-@@{database_version}@@ : CONFIGURE ORACLE GROUP"
}

f_create_def_group()
{
if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ORACLE GROUPS        "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    groupadd -g 54321 oinstall
    groupadd -g 54322 dba
    groupadd -g 54323 oper
    groupadd -g 54324 backupdba
    groupadd -g 54325 dgdba
    groupadd -g 54326 kmdba
    groupadd -g 54327 racdba
    groupadd -g 54328 asmadmin
    groupadd -g 54329 asmdba
    groupadd -g 54330 asmoper

elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : POSTGRES GROUP       "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
	groupadd -g 54321 postgres
    
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : MYSQL GROUP          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
	groupadd -g 54321 mysql
    
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : MongoDB GROUP          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
	groupadd -g 54321 mongodb
    
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi
}


f_create_def_oracle()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ORACLE USER          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    useradd -u 1001 -g oinstall -G dba,oper,backupdba,dgdba,kmdba,racdba,asmdba -d /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'
    echo "@@{cred_oracle.username}@@:@@{cred_oracle.secret}@@" | chpasswd
    echo "#ORACLE CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
    echo "@@{cred_oracle.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers


    #Configure 
    echo '# .bash_profile
    # Get the aliases and functions
    if [ -f ~/.bashrc ]; then
        . ~/.bashrc
    fi

    # User specific environment and startup programs

    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin
    ORACLE_BASE=/u02/app/oracle
    export ORACLE_BASE
    ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_BASE/product/'@@{database_version}@@'/dbhome_1
    ORACLE_SID=orcl;export ORACLE_SID
    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:$ORACLE_HOME/bin
    export ORACLE_SID ORACLE_HOME
    export PATH' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'/.bash_profile

    sudo chown @@{cred_oracle.username}@@:oinstall /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'/.bash_profile
}

f_create_def_grid()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ORACLE GRID          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    useradd -u 1002 -g oinstall -G dba,asmdba,asmoper,asmadmin,racdba -d /home/grid -s /bin/bash grid
    echo "@@{cred_grid.username}@@:@@{cred_grid.secret}@@" | chpasswd
    echo "#GRID CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
    echo "grid   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

    #Configure Grid Profile
    echo '# .bash_profile
    # Get the aliases and functions
    if [ -f ~/.bashrc ]; then
        . ~/.bashrc
    fi

    # User specific environment and startup programs

    export ORACLE_SID=+ASM
    export ORACLE_BASE=/u01/app/grid
    export ORACLE_HOME=/u01/app/grid/@@{database_version}@@/GI_home
    ORA_INVENTORY=/u01/app/oraInventory
    export PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/bin:$PATH
    export DISPLAY=localhost:0.0
    CVUQDISK_GRP=oinstall; export CVUQDISK_GRP
    alias sqlplus="rlwrap sqlplus"
    alias asmcmd="rlwrap asmcmd"
    alias adrci="rlwrap adrci"' | sudo tee /home/grid/.bash_profile

    chown grid:oinstall /home/grid/.bash_profile
}

f_create_def_postgres()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "       @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : POSTGRES USER          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
useradd -u 1001 -g postgres -d /home/'@@{cred_postgres.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_postgres.username}@@'

echo "@@{cred_postgres.username}@@:@@{cred_postgres.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#POSTGRES CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_postgres.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
export PGHOST=localhost' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_postgres.username}@@'/.bashrc
}

f_create_def_mysql()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "       @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : MySQL USER          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
useradd -u 1002 -g @@{cred_mysql.username}@@ -d /home/'@@{cred_mysql.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_mysql.username}@@'

echo "@@{cred_mysql.username}@@:@@{cred_mysql.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#MySQL CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_mysql.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
umask 022' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_mysql.username}@@'/.bashrc
}

f_create_def_appuser()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "       @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : APP USER               "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
useradd -u 1001 -g @@{cred_mongod.username}@@ -d /home/'@@{cred_appuser.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_appuser.username}@@'

echo "@@{cred_appuser.username}@@:@@{cred_appuser.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#POSTGRES CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_appuser.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
export APPHOST=' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_appuser.username}@@'/.bashrc
}

f_create_def_mongodb()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "       @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : MONGODB USER           "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

useradd -u 1002 -g @@{cred_mongod.username}@@ -d /home/'@@{cred_mongod.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_mongod.username}@@'

chown -R @@{cred_mongod.username}@@:@@{cred_mongod.username}@@ /home/'@@{cred_mongod.username}@@'

echo "@@{cred_mongod.username}@@:@@{cred_mongod.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#MONGODB CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_mongod.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo ""
echo "MONGODB GROUP CONFIGURATION"
echo ""

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_mongod.username}@@'/.bashrc
}

f_create_def_era()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "     @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ERA ADMIN GROUP          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    groupadd -g 54331 @@{cred_era_admin.username}@@

echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ERA USER           "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"


    useradd -u 1003 -g @@{cred_era_admin.username}@@ -d  /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'
    echo "@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@":"Nutanix.1" | chpasswd
    echo "#ERA CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
    echo "@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

    mkdir /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/
    echo '@@{era_PublicKey}@@' >> /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/authorized_keys

    chmod 700  /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh
    chmod 600 /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/authorized_keys
    chown -R '@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@':'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@' /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh
    
    
    
    if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      ERA User Profile For Oracle                      "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo '# .bash_profile
    # Get the aliases and functions
    if [ -f ~/.bashrc ]; then
        . ~/.bashrc
    fi

    # User specific environment and startup programs

    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin
    ORACLE_BASE=/u02/app/oracle
    export ORACLE_BASE
    ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_BASE/product/'@@{database_version}@@'/dbhome_1
    ORACLE_SID=orcl;export ORACLE_SID
    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:$ORACLE_HOME/bin
    export ORACLE_SID ORACLE_HOME
    export PATH' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'/.bash_profile


	elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      ERA User Profile For Postgres                    "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo '# .bashrc
    # User specific aliases and functions
    LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
    LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
    export LC_ALL
    export LC_CTYPE
    export PGHOST=localhost' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.bashrc
    
    elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      ERA User Profile For MySQL                       "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo '# .bashrc
	# User specific aliases and functions
	LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
	LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
	export LC_ALL
	export LC_CTYPE
    umask 022' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.bashrc
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi
}

f_config_oralInst()
{
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      CONFIGURE GRID oraInst.loc                       "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo '
    inventory_loc=/u01/app/oraInventory
    inst_group=oinstall' | sudo tee /etc/oraInst.loc
    chown oracle:oinstall /etc/oraInst.loc
    chmod 0664 /etc/oraInst.loc
}

main()
{
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@
arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
version=@@{database_version}@@

f_create_def_group


if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        		#0 = single_instance
                0)
                f_create_def_oracle
                f_create_def_era
                f_create_def_users_profile
                ;;
				#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                f_create_def_oracle
				f_create_def_grid
				f_create_def_era
                f_create_def_users_profile
                f_config_oralInst
                ;;
				
                *)
                echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                ;;
        esac

elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
	f_create_def_postgres
        f_create_def_era

elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
	f_create_def_mysql
        f_create_def_era

elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then
	f_create_def_mongodb
        f_create_def_era
    
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
fi
}

main

exit

#! /bin/bash

#Define Product Version

f_rhel_initialize()
{
	#Configure rhel settings
    #register
    #repository ...here
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                    function intialize rhel                          "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
subscription-manager register --username="@@{cred_rhel_username}@@" --password="@@{cred_rhel_password}@@" --force
subscription-manager attach --pool="@@{rhel_subscription}@@"

echo "exclude=redhat-release*" >> /etc/yum.conf   
}

f_rhel_terminate()
{
	#unregister
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                    function terminate rhel                          "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
subscription-manager unregister
}

f_oracle_initialize()
{
#Enable Epel
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                    Enable EPEL Repository                           "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

echo "[ol7_developer_EPEL]
name=Oracle Linux $releasever Developement Packages ($basearch)
baseurl=http://yum.oracle.com/repo/OracleLinux/OL7/developer_EPEL/$basearch/
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-oracle
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1" | tee /etc/yum.repos.d/epel-yum-ol7.repo
}

f_oracle_terminate()
{
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    function terminate Oracle                        "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"	
}

f_yum_package_oracle_install()
{
	yum install deltarpm -y
	yum install libxcb-1* -y
	yum install libXau-1* -y
	yum install libXtst-1* -y
	yum install libXrender* -y
	yum install libXrender-devel* -y
	yum install make-3* -y
	yum install smartmontools -y
	yum install nfs-utils -y
	yum install net-tools-2* -y
	yum install smartmontools -y
	yum install libXi-1* -y
	yum install libX11-1* -y
	yum install compat-db* -y
	yum install binutils -y
	yum install ksh -y 
	yum install libaio-devel -y
	yum install sysstat -y 
	yum install unixODBC -y
	yum install sysfsutils -y
	yum install sg3_utils -y
	yum install lsscsi -y
	yum install zlib-devel -y
	yum install libXp-devel -y
	yum install libXScrnSaver -y
	yum install compat-libstdc++-33* -y
	yum install compat-libcap -y
	yum install glibc-2* -y
	yum install glibc-devel-2* -y
	yum install ksh -y
	yum install libaio-0* -y
	yum install libaio-devel-0* -y
	yum install libgcc-4* -y
	yum install libstdc++-4* -y
	yum install libstdc++-devel-4* -y
	yum install oracleasm-support -y

#!/bin/bash

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "   @@{database_motor}@@ - @@{database_version}@@ : FORMAT AND CONFIG DRIVE    "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"

f_create_oracle_appdisk()
{
echo "-------------------------------------------------"
echo "$1"
echo "$2"
echo "$3"
echo "$4"
echo "$5"
echo "-------------------------------------------------"

if [[ $3 =~ "oracle" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                Oracle ($3) - $version : FORMAT $1 $2                       "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
#$1 - drive
#$2 - mount point
#$3 - owner
#$4 - group
    pvcreate /dev/"$1"
    
    #create VG on secondary disk
    vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
    lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

    #format partition in ext4
    mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

    #Configure automount in fstab using UUID
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"| sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "UUID=$uuid  /$2/app xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /"$2"/app
    mount -a

    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
    
    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
	mkdir -p /"$2"/app/oracle/product/"$5"/dbhome_1/
    chmod -R 775 /"$2"
	chown -R "$3":"$4" /"$2"

elif [[ $3 =~ "grid" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                 Oracle ($3) - $version : FORMAT $1 $2                        "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
#$1 - drive
#$2 - mount point
#$3 - owner
#$4 - group
#$5 - db_version
    pvcreate /dev/"$1"
    
    #create VG on secondary disk
    vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
    lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

    #format partition in ext4
    mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

    #Configure automount in fstab using UUID
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"| sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "UUID=$uuid  /$2/app xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /"$2"/app
    mount -a

    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
    chown -R "$3":"$4" /"$2"
    
    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
    mkdir -p /"$2"/app/grid/"$5"/GI_home
	chmod -R 775 /"$2"
	chown -R "$3":"$4" /"$2"
    
else 
	echo "I do not know ..."
fi
}

f_create_oracle_ocrdisk()
{
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                  Oracle - $version : FORMAT $1 - OCRDSK                      "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
#
#chown grid:asmadmin /dev/$1
echo "$1"1
#/usr/sbin/oracleasm createdisk OCRDSK /dev/"$1"1
#chown -R grid:asmadmin /dev/oracleasm/*
#/usr/sbin/oracleasm listdisks
#/usr/sbin/oracleasm configure
}

f_create_appdisk()
{
pvcreate /dev/"$1"
#create VG on secondary disk
vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

#format partition in xfs
mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

if [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                   POSTGRESQL - $version : FORMAT $1                          "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    mkdir /usr/local/pgsql
    chown postgres:postgres /usr/local/pgsql

    MyPostgresqlMajorVersion=$(echo @@{database_version}@@ | head -c 2)  
    echo "My Pgsql Major version is :" "$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2" | sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "/dev/mapper/vg_$2-lv_$2 /usr/pgsql-$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /usr/pgsql-"$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    mount -a
    chown -R "$3":"$3" /usr/pgsql-"$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    chmod -R 775 /usr/pgsql-"$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                     MYSQL - $version : FORMAT $2                             "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"

	pvcreate /dev/"$1"
    #create VG on secondary disk
    vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
    lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

    #format partition in xfs
    mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

    #Configure automount in fstab using UUID
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_MySql/lv_MySql | sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "/dev/mapper/vg_$2-lv_$2  /software xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /software
    mount -a
    chown -R mysql:mysql /software   
   	
    else 
    echo "do nothing"
fi
}

main()
{
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@
arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
version=@@{database_version}@@

if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        	#0 = single_instance
                0)
               		f_create_oracle_appdisk sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                        ;;
		#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                	f_create_oracle_appdisk sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                	f_create_oracle_appdisk sdc u01 grid oinstall $version
                	f_create_oracle_ocrdisk sdd
                        ;;
                *)
                        echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                        ;;
        esac
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then

        f_create_appdisk sdb app_pgsql postgres $version
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then

        f_create_appdisk sdb app_mysql mysql $version

elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then

        f_create_appdisk sdb app_mongodb mongodb $version

else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi
}

main

exit

#!/bin/bash

f_set_path()
{
  echo "app_path=/software/mysql-$2"
}

f_rhel_initialize()
{

    #register
    #repository ...here
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

subscription-manager register --username="@@{cred_rhel_username}@@" --password="@@{cred_rhel_password}@@" --force

f_deploy_database()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                     DEPLOY DATABASE $1                          "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
}

f_deploy_mysql()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                       DEPLOY MYSQL $1                               "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

cd /software
wget https://downloads.mysql.com/archives/get/p/23/file/mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar
tar -xvf mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar
tar -xvzf mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
mv mysql-$1-el7-x86_64 mysql-$1
rm mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar
rm mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
rm mysql-router-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
rm mysql-test-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
cd /software/mysql-$1/bin
./mysqld --initialize --user=mysql

echo "mysql init done !"
path="/software/mysql-$1"
}

f_deploy_mongodb()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                       DEPLOY MONGODB $1                             "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
}

f_deploy_pgsql()
{
MyPostgresqlMajorVersion=$(echo $1 | head -c 2)        

echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                     DEPLOY POSTGRESQL $2                            "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"


if [[ @@{dep_type}@@ =~ "RPM" ]]; then
        dnf install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/reporpms/EL-8-x86_64/pgdg-redhat-repo-latest.noarch.rpm
        dnf module disable postgresql -y
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-server*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-contrib*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-libs*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-devel*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-llvmjit*$1*
        echo "exclude=postgresql*" >> /etc/yum.conf
        chown -R postgres:postgres /usr/pgsql-*
        
    	echo "rpm deployment ok"
        
elif [[ @@{dep_type}@@ =~ "COMPILE" ]]; then
        
        #su - postgres -c "mkdir /usr/pgsql-'$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion'"
        llvmpath=$(which llvm-config-64)
        cd /tmp
        
        #Download Version based on selected version in BP
		wget https://ftp.postgresql.org/pub/source/v@@{database_version}@@/postgresql-@@{database_version}@@.tar.gz -P /tmp --no-check-certificate

		#Configure and Install PostgresQL
        su postgres -c "tar -xvzf postgresql-$1.tar.gz"
        cd /tmp/postgresql-@@{database_version}@@
        su postgres -c "/tmp/postgresql-@@{database_version}@@/configure --prefix=/usr/pgsql-'$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion' --with-openssl --with-ldap --with-systemd --with-libxml --enable-nls --with-system-tzdata=/usr/share/zoneinfo --with-pam --with-python --with-icu --with-tcl --with-gssapi --with-llvm LLVM_CONFIG='$llvmpath'"
        su postgres -c "make"
        su postgres -c "make install"
        su postgres -c "make install-docs"
        su postgres -c "make install-world"
        
        chown -R postgres:postgres /usr/pgsql-$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion
        
        echo "sources deployment ok"
else 
echo "a Nuxpresso ?"
fi

if [[ $2 =~ "HA" ]]; then

echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                         ADD  $2  COMPONENTS                         "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

        wget https://www.rpmfind.net/linux/centos/7.9.2009/extras/x86_64/Packages/etcd-3.3.11-2.el7.centos.x86_64.rpm
        yum localinstall etcd-3.3.11-2.el7.centos.x86_64.rpm -y
        
        dnf install -y haproxy
    	#this is needed when using haproxy version > 1.5.x
    	sudo ln -s /usr/sbin/haproxy  /usr/local/sbin/
        
        yum install keepalived -y 
        

        pip3 install --upgrade pip
        pip3 install -U setuptools
        pip3 install urllib3==1.24.2
        pip3 install patroni[etcd]==2.1.1
        pip3 install grpcio==1.26.0
        pip3 install etcd3==0.10.0
        pip3 install psycopg2-binary==2.8.6 


        ln -s /usr/local/bin/patroni /usr/bin/patroni
        ln -s /usr/local/bin/patronictl /usr/bin/patronictl

        patroni --version

        #clean etc default config
        rm -rf /var/lib/etcd/*
        rm -rf /etc/etcd/etcd.yml
        systemctl disable etcd

        #enable iptables-services (mandatory for keepalive)

        sudo keepalived --version
fi
}

main()
{
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@
arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
version=@@{database_version}@@

if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        		#0 = single_instance
                0)
               		f_create_oracle_deployment sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                ;;
				#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                	f_create_oracle_deployment sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                	f_create_grid_deployment sdc u01 grid oinstall $version
                ;;
                *)
                echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                ;;
        esac        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
        f_rhel_initialize
        f_deploy_pgsql $version $arch_type
        f_rhel_terminate
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
		f_deploy_mysql $version
        f_set_path $env_type $version
        
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then

		f_deploy_mongodb $env_type $version
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
fi
}
main

exit

#!/bin/bash

f_check_dbrms()
{
	echo "--------------------------------------------"
    echo "        check if partition is created       "
    echo "--------------------------------------------"
	echo "DBRMS partition is created"
	mount | grep /u02
}

f_check_grid()
{
	echo "--------------------------------------------"
    echo "        check if partition is created       "
    echo "--------------------------------------------"
	echo "GRID partition is created"
	mount | grep /u01
}

f_check_app_content()
{
	echo "--------------------------------------------"
    echo "        Check if app binary exists          "
    echo "--------------------------------------------"
    ls -arlt @@{app_dir_path}@@
}

main()
{

arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@

if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        		#0 = single_instance
                0)
                f_check_dbrms
                ;;
				#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                f_check_dbrms
                f_check_grid
                ;;
				
                *)
                echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                ;;
        esac
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then

f_check_app_content

else
   echo "seems there is a 'kind of' issue"
   exit
fi
}

main

exit

#Enabled Services
sudo systemctl enable chronyd

#delete  tmp
rm -rf /tmp/*
ls -arlt /tmp

history -c

# Set creds and headers
era_user = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.username}@@"
era_pass = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.secret}@@"
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}

# Get Cluster ID
url = "https://@@{era_ip}@@/era/v0.9/clusters"
resp = urlreq(url, verb="GET", auth="BASIC", user=era_user, passwd=era_pass, headers=headers)

if resp.ok:
    print("CLUSTER_ID={0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)[0]["id"]))
else:
    print("Get Cluster ID request failed", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4))
    exit(1)

# Set creds, headers, and URL
era_user = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.username}@@"
era_pass = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.secret}@@"
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
url = "https://@@{era_ip}@@/era/v0.9/operations/@@{REGISTER_OPERATION_ID}@@"

# Monitor the operation
for x in range(20):

    print "Sleeping for 20 seconds."
    sleep(5)
    resp = urlreq(
        url, verb="GET", auth="BASIC", user=era_user, passwd=era_pass, headers=headers
    )
    print "Percentage Complete: {0}".format(
        json.loads(resp.content)["percentageComplete"]
    )

    # If complete, break out of loop
    if json.loads(resp.content)["percentageComplete"] == "100":
        break

# If the operation did not complete within 20 minutes, assume it's not successful and error out
if json.loads(resp.content)["percentageComplete"] != "100":
    print "Get Operation ID timed out", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4)
    exit(1)

# Get the newly provision DB Entity Name and set it to a variable
print "SOURCE_DBSERVER_ID={0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)["entityId"])

# Set creds and headers

era_user = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.username}@@"
db_type = "@@{database_motor}@@"
version = "@@{database_version}@@"
era_pass = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.secret}@@"
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
print "Monitoring Register DatabaseVM Operation..."

if db_type == "MySQL":
    # Set the URL and payload
    url = "https://@@{era_ip}@@/era/v0.9/profiles"
    payload = {
        "engineType": "mysql_database",
        "type": "Software",
        "topology": "single",
        "dbVersion": "ALL",
        "systemProfile": "false",
        "properties": [
            {
                "name": "SOURCE_DBSERVER_ID",
                "value": "@@{SOURCE_DBSERVER_ID}@@",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "ID of the database server that should be used as a reference to create the software profile",
            },
            {
                "name": "BASE_PROFILE_VERSION_NAME",
                "value": "MYSQL $version by Calm Blueprint",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Name of the base profile version.",
            },
            {
                "name": "BASE_PROFILE_VERSION_DESCRIPTION",
                "value": "Deployed by Calm @@{calm_application_name}@@",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Description of the base profile version.",
            },
            {
                "name": "OS_NOTES",
                "value": "",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Notes or description for the Operating System.",
            },
            {
                "name": "DB_SOFTWARE_NOTES",
                "value": "",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Description of the Postgres database software.",
            },
        ],
        "availableClusterIds": ["@@{CLUSTER_ID}@@"],
        "name": "@@{calm_application_name}@@",
    }

elif db_type == "Postgresql":
    # Set the URL and payload
    url = "https://@@{era_ip}@@/era/v0.9/profiles"
    payload = {
        "engineType": "postgres_database",
        "type": "Software",
        "topology": "single",
        "dbVersion": "ALL",
        "systemProfile": "false",
        "properties": [
            {
                "name": "SOURCE_DBSERVER_ID",
                "value": "@@{SOURCE_DBSERVER_ID}@@",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "ID of the database server that should be used as a reference to create the software profile",
            },
            {
                "name": "BASE_PROFILE_VERSION_NAME",
                "value": "POSTGRESQL $version by Calm Blueprint",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Name of the base profile version.",
            },
            {
                "name": "BASE_PROFILE_VERSION_DESCRIPTION",
                "value": "Deployed by Calm @@{calm_application_name}@@",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Description of the base profile version.",
            },
            {
                "name": "OS_NOTES",
                "value": "",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Notes or description for the Operating System.",
            },
            {
                "name": "DB_SOFTWARE_NOTES",
                "value": "",
                "secure": "false",
                "description": "Description of the Postgres database software.",
            },
        ],
        "availableClusterIds": ["@@{CLUSTER_ID}@@"],
        "name": "@@{calm_application_name}@@",
    }

# Make the call and set the response operation ID to the variable
resp = urlreq(
    url,
    verb="POST",
    auth="BASIC",
    user=era_user,
    passwd=era_pass,
    params=json.dumps(payload),
    headers=headers,
)
if resp.ok:
    print "CREATEPROFILE_OPERATION_ID={0}".format(
        json.loads(resp.content)["operationId"]
    )
else:
    print "Create Profile failed", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4)
    exit(1)

# Set creds, headers, and URL
era_user = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.username}@@"
era_pass = "@@{cred_era_admin_password.secret}@@"
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
url = "https://@@{era_ip}@@:8443/era/v0.8/operations/@@{CREATEPROFILE_OPERATION_ID}@@"

# Monitor the operation
for x in range(20):

    print "Sleeping for 60 seconds."
    sleep(60)
    resp = urlreq(
        url, verb="GET", auth="BASIC", user=era_user, passwd=era_pass, headers=headers
    )
    print "Percentage Complete: {0}".format(
        json.loads(resp.content)["percentageComplete"]
    )

    # If complete, break out of loop
    if json.loads(resp.content)["percentageComplete"] == "100":
        break

# If the operation did not complete within 20 minutes, assume it's not successful and error out
if json.loads(resp.content)["percentageComplete"] != "100":
    print "Get Operation ID timed out", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4)
    exit(1)

# Get the newly provision DB Entity Name and set it to a variable

#!/bin/bash

sudo rm /etc/chrony.conf

echo '
# Initial chrony.conf Calm Automation Configuration
server @@{SrvNtp1}@@ iburst
server @@{SrvNtp2}@@ iburst


# Record the rate at which the system clock gains/losses time.
driftfile /var/lib/chrony/drift

# Allow the system clock to be stepped in the first three updates
# if its offset is larger than 1 second.
makestep 1.0 3

# Enable kernel synchronization of the real-time clock (RTC).
rtcsync

# Increase the minimum number of selectable sources required to adjust
# the system clock.
minsources 2

# Specify directory for log files.
logdir /var/log/chrony ' | sudo tee /etc/chrony.conf

sudo rm /etc/resolv.conf
echo '
# Initial resolv.conf Calm Automation Configuration
search @@{DnsSearchList}@@
nameserver @@{SrvDns1}@@
nameserver @@{SrvDns2}@@
' | sudo tee /etc/resolv.conf

exit 0

attrs.script:
#! /bin/bash


f_linux_8()
{
	#unregister
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "              Function Config config RHEL / OEL / RLINUX v8          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    set firewall-> disabled                          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld

}


f_linux_7()
{
	#unregister
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "             Function Config RHEL / OEL / RLINUX  v7                 "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    set firewall-> disabled                          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld

}

f_linux_common()
{

#Disable selinux
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                    set Selinux -> disabled                          "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
setenforce 0

#Disable AVAHI
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                        Disable AVAHI                                "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
sudo systemctl stop avahi-daemon
sudo systemctl disable avahi-daemon

#Configure Hostname
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                   Config   hostname/hostfile                        "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

echo "ORACLE 12CR2 : CONFIGURE HOSTNAME"
hostnamectl set-hostname '@@{name}@@'
echo '@@{address}@@  @@{name}@@  @@{name}@@.@@{domain_name}@@' > /etc/hosts
echo "Configuration host file : " >> /tmp/install_log.txt
echo "    hostname and host file configured" >> /tmp/install_log.txt

#Configure Hostname
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                   Config   PE SIZE TO 1024.                         "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

sed -i 's/# physical_extent_size = 4096/physical_extent_size = 1024/' /etc/lvm/lvm.conf


f_specific_oracle_params()
{
#configure oracle systcl.conf params
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           Config   SYSCTL.conf  @@{database_motor}@@                "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

echo '# sysctl settings are defined through files in
# /usr/lib/sysctl.d/, /run/sysctl.d/, and /etc/sysctl.d/.
#
# Vendors settings live in /usr/lib/sysctl.d/.
# To override a whole file, create a new file with the same in
# /etc/sysctl.d/ and put new settings there. To override
# only specific settings, add a file with a lexically later
# name in /etc/sysctl.d/ and put new settings there.
#
# For more information, see sysctl.conf(5) and sysctl.d(5).

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for fs.file-max is 6815744
fs.file-max = 6815744

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.sem is '250 32000 100 128'
kernel.sem = 250 32000 100 128

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.shmmni is 4096
kernel.shmmni = 4096

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.shmall is 1073741824 on x86_64
kernel.shmall = 1073741824

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.shmmax is 4398046511104 on x86_64
kernel.shmmax = 4398046511104

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for kernel.panic_on_oops is 1 per Orabug 19212317
kernel.panic_on_oops = 1

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.rmem_default is 262144
net.core.rmem_default = 262144

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.rmem_max is 4194304 changed to 536870912
net.core.rmem_max = 536870912

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.wmem_default is 262144 changed to 536870912
net.core.wmem_default = 536870912

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.core.wmem_max is 1048576
net.core.wmem_max = 1048576

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter is 2
net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter = 2

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter is 2
net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter = 2

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for fs.aio-max-nr is 1048576
fs.aio-max-nr = 1048576

# oracle-database-server-12cR2-preinstall setting for net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range is 9000 65500
net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range = 9000 65500

vm.swappiness = 0
vm.overcommit_memory = 1
vm.dirty_background_ratio = 5
vm.dirty_ratio = 15
vm.dirty_expire_centisecs = 500
vm.dirty_writeback_centisecs = 100
net.ipv4.tcp_mtu_probing = 1
net.ipv4.tcp_rmem = 4096 87380 536870912
net.core.netdev_max_backlog = 250000
net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control = htcp
net.core.somaxconn = 65535
net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl = 15
net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout = 15
net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes = 5
net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse = 1
net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog = 65535
net.ipv4.tcp_wmem = 4096 65536 536870912' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.conf
sudo sysctl -p

#configure limits.conf
    echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo "                      Config   LIMITS.conf                           "
	echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

sudo sed -i '/# End of file/i \
grid soft nofile  131072\
grid hard nofile  131072\
grid soft nproc   131072\
grid hard nproc   131072\
oracle soft nofile  131072\
oracle hard nofile  131072\
oracle soft nproc   131072\
oracle hard nproc   131072\
oracle soft core  unlimited\
oracle hard core    unlimited\
oracle soft memlock 50000000\
oracle hard memlock 50000000\
oracle soft stack    10240\
oracle hard stack    32768' /etc/security/limits.conf
}

f_specific_postgres_params()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           Config   SYSCTL.conf  @@{database_motor}@@                "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo 'vm.swappiness=0
vm.overcommit_memory = 1
vm.nr_hugepages=0
vm.dirty_background_ratio = 5
vm.dirty_ratio = 15
vm.dirty_expire_centisecs = 500
vm.dirty_writeback_centisecs=100' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/97-pgsql-database-sysctl.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/97-pgsql-database-sysctl.conf

echo 'net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0
net.ipv4.conf.ens3.accept_redirects=0' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/96-disable-icmpv4.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/96-disable-icmpv4.conf

echo 'net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1
net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6 = 1' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/95-disable-ipv6.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/95-disable-ipv6.conf


echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "           Config   UDEV RULES  @@{database_motor}@@                 "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo '
ACTION=="add|change", SUBSYSTEM=="block", RUN+="/bin/sh -c '/bin/echo 1024 > /sys%p/queue/max_sectors_kb'"'| sudo tee /etc/udev/rules.d/71-block-max-sectors.rules
}

}
main()
{
echo "--------------------------------------------"
echo "      It is set ..@@{app_dir_path}@@   "
echo "--------------------------------------------"
PRODUCT_MINOR_VERSION=$(egrep '^(VERSION)=' /etc/os-release | sed 's/.*=//' | sed 's/"//g')
PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION=${PRODUCT_MINOR_VERSION::1}
echo "The product version is " $PRODUCT_MINOR_VERSION
echo "The major version is " $PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION
PRODUCT_NAME=$(egrep '^(NAME)=' /etc/os-release | sed 's/.*=//' | sed 's/"//g')
echo "The linux os used is " $PRODUCT_NAME

if [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Red" ]]; then
        case $PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION in
                7)
                echo "Version is 7 we will use yum"
                f_linux_common
                f_linux_7
                ;;

                8)
                echo "Version is 8 we will use dnf"
                f_linux_common
                f_linux_8
                ;;

                *)
                echo "....I do not  ..know"
                ;;
        esac

elif [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $PRODUCT_MAJOR_VERSION in
                7)
                echo "Version is 7 we will use yum"
                f_linux_common
                f_linux_7
                ;;
			
                8)
                echo "Version is 8 we will use dnf"
				f_linux_common
                f_linux_8
                ;;
                
                *)
                echo "....I do not know"
                ;;
        esac
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi

if [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
   		f_specific_oracle_param

elif [[ $PRODUCT_NAME =~ "Postgres" ]]; then
        f_specific_postgres_params
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi

}

main

exit

#!/bin/bash

f_create_def_users_profile()
{
    #Configure Users Profile
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                        Configure User Profile                         "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"


    echo 'if [ $USER = "oracle" ] || [ $USER = "grid" ] ; then
    if [ $SHELL = "/bin/ksh" ]; then             
    ulimit -p 16384             
    ulimit -n 65536             
    else             
         ulimit -u 16384 -n 65536             
    fi             
    fi' | sudo tee -a /etc/profile

    echo "@@{database_motor}@@-@@{database_version}@@ : CONFIGURE ORACLE GROUP"
}

f_create_def_group()
{
if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ORACLE GROUPS        "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    groupadd -g 54321 oinstall
    groupadd -g 54322 dba
    groupadd -g 54323 oper
    groupadd -g 54324 backupdba
    groupadd -g 54325 dgdba
    groupadd -g 54326 kmdba
    groupadd -g 54327 racdba
    groupadd -g 54328 asmadmin
    groupadd -g 54329 asmdba
    groupadd -g 54330 asmoper

elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : POSTGRES GROUP       "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
	groupadd -g 54321 postgres
    
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : MYSQL GROUP          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
	groupadd -g 54321 mysql
    
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : MongoDB GROUP          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
	groupadd -g 54321 mongodb
    
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi
}


f_create_def_oracle()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ORACLE USER          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    useradd -u 1001 -g oinstall -G dba,oper,backupdba,dgdba,kmdba,racdba,asmdba -d /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'
    echo "@@{cred_oracle.username}@@:@@{cred_oracle.secret}@@" | chpasswd
    echo "#ORACLE CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
    echo "@@{cred_oracle.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers


    #Configure 
    echo '# .bash_profile
    # Get the aliases and functions
    if [ -f ~/.bashrc ]; then
        . ~/.bashrc
    fi

    # User specific environment and startup programs

    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin
    ORACLE_BASE=/u02/app/oracle
    export ORACLE_BASE
    ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_BASE/product/'@@{database_version}@@'/dbhome_1
    ORACLE_SID=orcl;export ORACLE_SID
    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:$ORACLE_HOME/bin
    export ORACLE_SID ORACLE_HOME
    export PATH' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'/.bash_profile

    sudo chown @@{cred_oracle.username}@@:oinstall /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'/.bash_profile
}

f_create_def_grid()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "         @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ORACLE GRID          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    useradd -u 1002 -g oinstall -G dba,asmdba,asmoper,asmadmin,racdba -d /home/grid -s /bin/bash grid
    echo "@@{cred_grid.username}@@:@@{cred_grid.secret}@@" | chpasswd
    echo "#GRID CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
    echo "grid   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

    #Configure Grid Profile
    echo '# .bash_profile
    # Get the aliases and functions
    if [ -f ~/.bashrc ]; then
        . ~/.bashrc
    fi

    # User specific environment and startup programs

    export ORACLE_SID=+ASM
    export ORACLE_BASE=/u01/app/grid
    export ORACLE_HOME=/u01/app/grid/@@{database_version}@@/GI_home
    ORA_INVENTORY=/u01/app/oraInventory
    export PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/bin:$PATH
    export DISPLAY=localhost:0.0
    CVUQDISK_GRP=oinstall; export CVUQDISK_GRP
    alias sqlplus="rlwrap sqlplus"
    alias asmcmd="rlwrap asmcmd"
    alias adrci="rlwrap adrci"' | sudo tee /home/grid/.bash_profile

    chown grid:oinstall /home/grid/.bash_profile
}

f_create_def_era()
{
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "     @@{database_motor}@@ @@{database_version}@@ : ERA ADMIN GROUP          "
echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    groupadd -g 54331 @@{cred_era_admin.username}@@

echo "----------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    useradd -u 1003 -g @@{cred_era_admin.username}@@ -d  /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'
    echo "@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@":"Nutanix.1" | chpasswd
    echo "#ERA CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
    echo "@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

    mkdir /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/
    echo '@@{era_PublicKey}@@' >> /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/authorized_keys

    chmod 700  /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh
    chmod 600 /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/authorized_keys
    chown -R '@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@':'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@' /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh
    
    
    
    if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      ERA User Profile For Oracle                      "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo '# .bash_profile
    # Get the aliases and functions
    if [ -f ~/.bashrc ]; then
        . ~/.bashrc
    fi

    # User specific environment and startup programs

    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin
    ORACLE_BASE=/u02/app/oracle
    export ORACLE_BASE
    ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_BASE/product/'@@{database_version}@@'/dbhome_1
    ORACLE_SID=orcl;export ORACLE_SID
    PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:$ORACLE_HOME/bin
    export ORACLE_SID ORACLE_HOME
    export PATH' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_oracle.username}@@'/.bash_profile


	elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      ERA User Profile For Postgres                    "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo '# .bashrc
    # User specific aliases and functions
    LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
    LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
    export LC_ALL
    export LC_CTYPE
    export PGHOST=localhost' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.bashrc
    
    elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      ERA User Profile For MySQL                       "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
	echo '# .bashrc
	# User specific aliases and functions
	LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
	LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
	export LC_ALL
	export LC_CTYPE
    umask 022' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.bashrc
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi
}

f_config_oralInst()
{
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo "                      CONFIGURE GRID oraInst.loc                       "
    echo "-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
    echo '
    inventory_loc=/u01/app/oraInventory
    inst_group=oinstall' | sudo tee /etc/oraInst.loc
    chown oracle:oinstall /etc/oraInst.loc
    chmod 0664 /etc/oraInst.loc
}

main()
{
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@
arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
version=@@{database_version}@@

f_create_def_group


if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        		#0 = single_instance
                0)
                f_create_def_oracle
                f_create_def_era
                f_create_def_users_profile
                ;;
				#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                f_create_def_oracle
				f_create_def_grid
				f_create_def_era
                f_create_def_users_profile
                f_config_oralInst
                ;;
				
                *)
                echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                ;;
        esac

elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
	f_create_def_postgres
        f_create_def_era

elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
	f_create_def_mysql
        f_create_def_era

elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then
	f_create_def_mongodb
        f_create_def_era
    
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
fi
}

main

exit

                		8)

                              f_rhel_initialize
                              f_dnf_package_mysql_install
                              f_rhel_terminate
                              ;;

                		*)
                              echo "....I do not  ..know"
                              ;;
        	esac
    fi
fi
}

main


exit

#!/bin/bash

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "   @@{database_motor}@@ - @@{database_version}@@ : FORMAT AND CONFIG DRIVE    "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"

f_create_oracle_appdisk()
{
echo "-------------------------------------------------"
echo "$1"
echo "$2"
echo "$3"
echo "$4"
echo "$5"
echo "-------------------------------------------------"

if [[ $3 =~ "oracle" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                Oracle ($3) - $version : FORMAT $1 $2                       "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
#$1 - drive
#$2 - mount point
#$3 - owner
#$4 - group
    pvcreate /dev/"$1"
    
    #create VG on secondary disk
    vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
    lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

    #format partition in ext4
    mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

    #Configure automount in fstab using UUID
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"| sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "UUID=$uuid  /$2/app xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /"$2"/app
    mount -a

    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
    
    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
	mkdir -p /"$2"/app/oracle/product/"$5"/dbhome_1/
    chmod -R 775 /"$2"
	chown -R "$3":"$4" /"$2"

elif [[ $3 =~ "grid" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                 Oracle ($3) - $version : FORMAT $1 $2                        "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
#$1 - drive
#$2 - mount point
#$3 - owner
#$4 - group
#$5 - db_version
    pvcreate /dev/"$1"
    
    #create VG on secondary disk
    vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
    lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

    #format partition in ext4
    mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

    #Configure automount in fstab using UUID
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"| sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "UUID=$uuid  /$2/app xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /"$2"/app
    mount -a

    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
    chown -R "$3":"$4" /"$2"
    
    #create and assign folder permission for oracle user
    mkdir -p /"$2"/app/grid/"$5"/GI_home
	chmod -R 775 /"$2"
	chown -R "$3":"$4" /"$2"
    
else 
	echo "I do not know ..."
fi
}

f_create_oracle_ocrdisk()
{
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                  Oracle - $version : FORMAT $1 - OCRDSK                      "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
#
#chown grid:asmadmin /dev/$1
echo "$1"1
#/usr/sbin/oracleasm createdisk OCRDSK /dev/"$1"1
#chown -R grid:asmadmin /dev/oracleasm/*
#/usr/sbin/oracleasm listdisks
#/usr/sbin/oracleasm configure
}

f_create_appdisk()
{
pvcreate /dev/"$1"
#create VG on secondary disk
vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

#format partition in xfs
mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

if [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                   POSTGRESQL - $version : FORMAT $1                          "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"

    mkdir /usr/local/pgsql
    chown postgres:postgres /usr/local/pgsql

    MyPostgresqlMajorVersion=$(echo @@{database_version}@@ | head -c 2)  
    echo "My Pgsql Major version is :" "$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2" | sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "/dev/mapper/vg_$2-lv_$2 /usr/pgsql-$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /usr/pgsql-"$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    mount -a
    chown -R "$3":"$3" /usr/pgsql-"$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    chmod -R 775 /usr/pgsql-"$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion"
    
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then

echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                     MYSQL - $version : FORMAT $2                             "
echo "------------------------------------------------------------------------------"

	pvcreate /dev/"$1"
    #create VG on secondary disk
    vgcreate vg_"$2" /dev/"$1"
    lvcreate -n lv_"$2" -l 100%FREE vg_"$2"

    #format partition in xfs
    mkfs.xfs /dev/vg_"$2"/lv_"$2"

    #Configure automount in fstab using UUID
    uuid=$(blkid /dev/vg_MySql/lv_MySql | sed -n 's/.*UUID=\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p')
    echo "/dev/mapper/vg_$2-lv_$2  /software xfs defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
    mkdir -p /software
    mount -a
    chown -R mysql:mysql /software   
   	
    else 
    echo "do nothing"
fi
}

main()
{
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@
arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
version=@@{database_version}@@

if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        	#0 = single_instance
                0)
               		f_create_oracle_appdisk sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                        ;;
		#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                	f_create_oracle_appdisk sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                	f_create_oracle_appdisk sdc u01 grid oinstall $version
                	f_create_oracle_ocrdisk sdd
                        ;;
                *)
                        echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                        ;;
        esac
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then

        f_create_appdisk sdb app_pgsql postgres $version
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then

        f_create_appdisk sdb app_mysql mysql $version

elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then

        f_create_appdisk sdb app_mongodb mongodb $version

else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
   exit
fi
}

main

exit

#!/bin/bash

f_set_path()
{
  echo "app_path=/software/mysql-$2"
}

f_rhel_initialize()
{
	#Configure rhel settings
    #register
    #repository ...here
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                    function intialize rhel                          "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
subscription-manager register --username="@@{cred_rhel_username}@@" --password="@@{cred_rhel_password}@@" --force
subscription-manager attach --pool="@@{rhel_subscription}@@"
}

f_rhel_terminate()
{
	#unregister
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                    function terminate rhel                          "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
subscription-manager unregister
}


f_deploy_database()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                     DEPLOY DATABASE $1                          "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
}

f_deploy_mysql()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                       DEPLOY MYSQL $1                               "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

cd /software
wget https://downloads.mysql.com/archives/get/p/23/file/mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar
tar -xvf mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar
tar -xvzf mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
mv mysql-$1-el7-x86_64 mysql-$1
rm mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar
rm mysql-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
rm mysql-router-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
rm mysql-test-$1-el7-x86_64.tar.gz
cd /software/mysql-$1/bin
./mysqld --initialize --user=mysql

echo "mysql init done !"
path="/software/mysql-$1"
}

f_deploy_mongodb()
{
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                       DEPLOY MONGODB $1                             "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
}

f_deploy_pgsql()
{
MyPostgresqlMajorVersion=$(echo $1 | head -c 2)        

echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                     DEPLOY POSTGRESQL $2                            "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"


if [[ @@{dep_type}@@ =~ "RPM" ]]; then
        dnf install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/reporpms/EL-8-x86_64/pgdg-redhat-repo-latest.noarch.rpm
        dnf module disable postgresql -y
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-server*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-contrib*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-libs*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-devel*$1*
        sudo yum install -y postgresql$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion-llvmjit*$1*
        echo "exclude=postgresql*" >> /etc/yum.conf
        chown -R postgres:postgres /usr/pgsql-*
        
    	echo "rpm deployment ok"
        
elif [[ @@{dep_type}@@ =~ "COMPILE" ]]; then
        
        #su - postgres -c "mkdir /usr/pgsql-'$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion'"
        llvmpath=$(which llvm-config-64)
        cd /tmp
        
        #Download Version based on selected version in BP
		wget https://ftp.postgresql.org/pub/source/v@@{database_version}@@/postgresql-@@{database_version}@@.tar.gz -P /tmp --no-check-certificate

		#Configure and Install PostgresQL
        su postgres -c "tar -xvzf postgresql-$1.tar.gz"
        cd /tmp/postgresql-@@{database_version}@@
        su postgres -c "/tmp/postgresql-@@{database_version}@@/configure --prefix=/usr/pgsql-'$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion' --with-openssl --with-ldap --with-systemd --with-libxml --enable-nls --with-system-tzdata=/usr/share/zoneinfo --with-pam --with-python --with-icu --with-tcl --with-gssapi --with-llvm LLVM_CONFIG='$llvmpath'"
        su postgres -c "make"
        su postgres -c "make install"
        su postgres -c "make install-docs"
        su postgres -c "make install-world"
        
        chown -R postgres:postgres /usr/pgsql-$MyPostgresqlMajorVersion
        
        echo "sources deployment ok"
else 
echo "a Nuxpresso ?"
fi

if [[ $2 =~ "HA" ]]; then

echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"
echo "                         ADD  $2  COMPONENTS                         "
echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------"

        wget https://www.rpmfind.net/linux/centos/7.9.2009/extras/x86_64/Packages/etcd-3.3.11-2.el7.centos.x86_64.rpm
        yum localinstall etcd-3.3.11-2.el7.centos.x86_64.rpm -y
        
        dnf install -y haproxy
    	#this is needed when using haproxy version > 1.5.x
    	sudo ln -s /usr/sbin/haproxy  /usr/local/sbin/
        
        yum install keepalived -y 
        

        pip3 install --upgrade pip
        pip3 install -U setuptools
        pip3 install urllib3==1.24.2
        pip3 install patroni[etcd]==2.1.1
        pip3 install grpcio==1.26.0
        pip3 install etcd3==0.10.0
        pip3 install psycopg2-binary==2.8.6 


        ln -s /usr/local/bin/patroni /usr/bin/patroni
        ln -s /usr/local/bin/patronictl /usr/bin/patronictl

        patroni --version

        #clean etc default config
        rm -rf /var/lib/etcd/*
        rm -rf /etc/etcd/etcd.yml
        systemctl disable etcd

        #enable iptables-services (mandatory for keepalive)

        sudo keepalived --version
fi
}

main()
{
env_type=@@{database_motor}@@
arch_type=@@{architecture}@@
version=@@{database_version}@@

if [[ $env_type =~ "Oracle" ]]; then
        case $arch_type in
        		#0 = single_instance
                0)
               		f_create_oracle_deployment sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                ;;
				#1 = grid_instance
                1)
                	f_create_oracle_deployment sdb u02 oracle oinstall $version
                	f_create_grid_deployment sdc u01 grid oinstall $version
                ;;
                *)
                echo "....I do not  ...  know"
                ;;
        esac        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "Postgresql" ]]; then
        f_rhel_initialize
        f_deploy_pgsql $version $arch_type
        f_rhel_terminate
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MySQL" ]]; then
		f_deploy_mysql $version
        f_set_path $env_type $version
        
        
elif [[ $env_type =~ "MongoDB" ]]; then

		f_deploy_mongodb $env_type $version
else
   echo "the version is not supported by era"
fi
}
main

exit
